sentences: Harold Danko (born June 13, 1947 in Ohio) is an American jazz pianist.
He worked often with Rich Perry in the 1990s and also played with Rufus Reid, Kirk Lightsey, Jeff Hirshfield, Edward Simon, and Gregory Herbert.
